self.name: InputUser
self.descriptionExcerpt: Defines a user for subsequent interaction.

nodes.name: inputUserEmpty
nodes.description: Empty constructor, does not define a user.

nodes.name: inputUserSelf
nodes.description: Defines the current user.

nodes.name: inputUser
nodes.description: Defines a user for further interaction.

nodes.name: inputUserFromMessage
nodes.description: Defines a min user that was seen in a certain message of a certain chat.

nodes.name: inputPrivacyValueAllowUsers
nodes.description: Allow only certain users

nodes.name: inputPrivacyValueDisallowUsers
nodes.description: Disallow only certain users

nodes.name: inputKeyboardButtonUrlAuth
nodes.description: Button to request a user to messages.acceptUrlAuth via URL using Seamless Telegram Login.

nodes.name: inputMessageEntityMentionName
nodes.description: Message entity that can be used to create a user user mention: received mentions use the messageEntityMentionName constructor, instead.

nodes.name: inputGameShortName
nodes.description: Game by short name

nodes.name: help.getUserInfo
nodes.description: Internal use

nodes.name: help.editUserInfo
nodes.description: Internal use

nodes.name: contacts.deleteContacts
nodes.description: Deletes several contacts from the list.

nodes.name: contacts.addContact
nodes.description: Add an existing telegram user as contact.

nodes.name: contacts.acceptContact
nodes.description: If the peerSettings of a new user allow us to add them as contact, add that user as contact

nodes.name: messages.addChatUser
nodes.description: Adds a user to a chat and sends a service message on it.

nodes.name: messages.deleteChatUser
nodes.description: Deletes a user from a chat and sends a service message on it.

nodes.name: messages.createChat
nodes.description: Creates a new chat.

nodes.name: messages.requestEncryption
nodes.description: Sends a request to start a secret chat to the user.

nodes.name: messages.startBot
nodes.description: Start a conversation with a bot using a deep linking parameter

nodes.name: messages.editChatAdmin
nodes.description: Make a user admin in a legacy group.

nodes.name: messages.getInlineBotResults
nodes.description: Query an inline bot

nodes.name: messages.setGameScore
nodes.description: Use this method to set the score of the specified user in a game sent as a normal message (bots only).

nodes.name: messages.setInlineGameScore
nodes.description: Use this method to set the score of the specified user in a game sent as an inline message (bots only).

nodes.name: messages.getGameHighScores
nodes.description: Get highscores of a game

nodes.name: messages.getInlineGameHighScores
nodes.description: Get highscores of a game sent using an inline bot

nodes.name: messages.getCommonChats
nodes.description: Get chats in common with a user

nodes.name: photos.getUserPhotos
nodes.description: Returns the list of user photos.

nodes.name: channels.deleteUserHistory
nodes.description: Delete all messages sent by a certain user in a supergroup

nodes.name: channels.reportSpam
nodes.description: Reports some messages from a user in a supergroup as spam; requires administrator rights in the supergroup

nodes.name: channels.editAdmin
nodes.description: Modify the admin rights of a user in a supergroup/channel.

nodes.name: channels.inviteToChannel
nodes.description: Invite users to a channel/supergroup

nodes.name: channels.getAdminLog
nodes.description: Get the admin log of a channel/supergroup

nodes.name: channels.editCreator
nodes.description: Transfer channel ownership

nodes.name: phone.requestCall
nodes.description: Start a telegram phone call

nodes.name: stickers.createStickerSet
nodes.description: Create a stickerset, bots only.

nodes.name: users.getUsers
nodes.description: Returns basic user info according to their identifiers.

nodes.name: users.getFullUser
nodes.description: Returns extended user info by ID.

nodes.name: users.setSecureValueErrors
nodes.description: Notify the user that the sent passport data contains some errors The user will not be able to re-submit their Passport data to you until the errors are fixed (the contents of the field for which you returned the error must change).
